Package client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
client.Client
public class Client extends Object
Class for the client. Responsible for sending and receiving messages from the server.

    • Client

      public Client(InetAddress address, int port) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

  • Method Details

    • isQueued

      public boolean isQueued()
      Returns whether the client is queued or not.
      Returns:
      true if the client is queued, false otherwise.

    • setQueued

      public void setQueued(boolean queued)
      Setter for the isQueued variable.
      Parameters:
      queued - the value to be set.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the connection.

    • sendListCommand

      public void sendListCommand()
      Delegates to the clientConnection to send the list command.

    • sendQueueCommand

      public void sendQueueCommand()
      Delegates to the clientConnection to send the queue command.

    • sendMoveCommand

      public void sendMoveCommand(int location)
      Delegates to the clientConnection to send the move command.
      Parameters:
      location - the location to be sent.

    • sendLogInCommand

      public void sendLogInCommand(String sentUsername)
      Delegates to the clientConnection to send the login command.
      Parameters:
      sentUsername - the username to be sent.

    • sendHelloCommand

      public void sendHelloCommand(String description)

    • sendErrorCommand

      public void sendErrorCommand(String error)
      Delegates to the clientConnection to send an error command.
      Parameters:
      error - the error message to be sent.

    • addListener

      public void addListener(ClientListener clientListener)
      Adds a listener to the client set. This adheres to the observer pattern.
      Parameters:
      clientListener - the listener to be added to the list.

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener(ClientListener clientListener)
      removes the client listener.
      Parameters:
      clientListener - to be removed.

    • receiveNewGame

      public void receiveNewGame(String name1, String name2)
      Handles the create game event in the listener.
      Parameters:
      name1 - the name of the first player.
      name2 - the name of the second player.

    • receiveMove

      public void receiveMove(int location)
      Handles the move event. in the listener.
      Parameters:
      location - the location of the move.

    • receiveError

      public void receiveError()
      Handles the error event in the listener.

    • receiveGameOver

      public void receiveGameOver(String reason, String winner)
      Handles the game over event in the listener.
      Parameters:
      reason - the reason for the game over.
      winner - the winner of the game.

    • receiveList

      public void receiveList(List<String> players)
      Handles the list event in the listener.
      Parameters:
      players - the list of players.

    • receiveLogin

      public void receiveLogin()
      Handles the login event in the listener.

    • receiveAlreadyLoggedIn

      public void receiveAlreadyLoggedIn()
      Handles the already logged in event in the listener.

    • receiveHello

      public void receiveHello()
      Handles the hello event in the listener.

    • handleDisconnect

      public void handleDisconnect()
      Handles the disconnect event. Gracefully closes the connection.

    • setUsername

      public void setUsername(String username)
      Sets the username of the client. This is used to identify the client on the client side. On the server side the login command is used to set the username instead.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to be set.

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      Returns the username of the client.
      Returns:
      the username of the client.
